verbs.description: Trump [V: has] proposed tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese products to punish Beijing for forcing U.S. companies to turn over technology in exchange for Chinese market access .

[ARG0: Trump] has [V: proposed] [ARG1: tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese products] [ARGM-PRP: to punish Beijing for forcing U.S. companies to turn over technology in exchange for Chinese market access] .

[ARG0: Trump] has proposed tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese products to [V: punish] [ARG1: Beijing] [ARG2: for forcing U.S. companies to turn over technology in exchange for Chinese market access] .

Trump has proposed tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese products to punish [ARG0: Beijing] for [V: forcing] [ARG1: U.S. companies] [ARG2: to turn over technology in exchange for Chinese market access] .

Trump has proposed tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese products to punish Beijing for forcing [ARG0: U.S. companies] to [V: turn] over [ARG1: technology] [ARGM-PRP: in exchange for Chinese market access] .
